content.shape: Circle,  Fireball,  Oval,  Sphere,  Triangle,  Unknown
content.summary: Orb flashing triangles in my bedroom, also ufo? orb? comet? ghost? inter dimensional beings?

content.detailedDescription: I was in my computer room at my house and was about to go back upstairs when the foyer lit up and i looked outside. at first it was a bright red color that lit up the sky. it was like an enormous firework had been set off. at first i thought it was a fire engine but i didn't hear any noise at all. it then switched to being blue and then to green. it lit up the sky pretty well. it was like when a flare is shot up into the sky. i could see all the houses in the neighborhood exceptionally well. all this lasted only approx. 10 seconds or so and then it stopped and the night was black again. this was at around 4:05 am so it was quite dark. when i first saw it happening i thought it couldn't be real. it was almost a sort of panic that ran through me. i ran up to my room and looked out the window to see if i could see or hear anything else but i couldn't. i looked it up online and the closest explanation i found for it was that it was a meteor entering the atmosphere. but the strange thing was that it didn't move at all. it just flashed in one spot and disappeared.
content.summary: Bright flashing, alternating lights that lit up the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I watch the sky frequently, especially at night, so i have a pretty good feeling for the flight patterns, shapes and sounds of the various domestic and military craft that crowd my seattle-area skies. at first glance i thought this was an airplane, but after i watched it i don't think it was one of ours this time, since there was a lot askew. tonight i watched three very large bright white lights in formation hover above lake washington and travel very slowly northeast, which was not the prevailing flight pattern i had been watching today. while i watched with 10x50 binoculars, there was a red light towards the right of the craft that flashed intermittently, but i was never able to see any green light, even though the craft was relatively close, not more than 10 miles away, and i should have been seeing the front side and back if it were a plane during those 3 minutes. there was no sound at all. it was almost as if the lights were flying in formation to mimic a plane, was the feeling i got. anyways, i kept waiting for the white lights to break apart, as i've seen in videos and while they never did during my watch, the snail-pace speed and the behavior of this ufo was unlike the airplanes i have been watching and filming. i also realized that i had not been able to get a good look at any of the planes tonight due to the cloud cover, while this craft was seen clearly. i have seen about five different ufos since december of last year, but this is the first time i reported one. in april of last year i saw three of them hover and then take off, and this was over lake washington as well.
content.summary: Series of lights hover, travel slowly northeast disappearing over trees.

content.detailedDescription:
Since the end of august, nearly every night with good visibility there have been very srange fire colored orbs in the south west area of lake michigan off the shores near holland, on the west side of the state.
this past week i once again witnessed these strange fireballs dance around the sky. the only waya to explain their movements, would be bouncing around, allmost in a seemingly playful matter, allmost "tag" like,
when i first saw the lights this past august, they hung very low in the air in a triangle patter, with 1 orb at the top and 2 on the bottom.
the strange thing other than the extreme movements they are making is their ability to just vanish and reappear in a completly differnet spot. i have also seen fighter jets as well as the stealth aircraft in the exact area moments after the firball orbs appear. the light will appear, and within 15-20 min. several jets head in the exact direction of the strange objects. let me tell you, i have been sober for over two years, so i was in now way intoxicated.
  once the jets show up, the orbs seem two just dim the light and dissapear once the jets get close. since august i have seen these orbs over a dozen times, with each time becoming stranger and stranger?
the firballs hang in place, sometimes going straight up or down, making abrupt stops, and "w" like patterns in the sky, allmost like if you were to take a ping pong ball and bounce it up and down as fast as you could. the lights seem to sway back and forth as well. 
  living on lake michigan for over 20 yrs, i have seen alot of air craft. where i live i am smack in the center of three air ports...Holland , grand haven, and grand rapids. and between two coast guard stations, grand haven and holland. i am very used to seeing all sorts of commercial and private planes, as well as coast guard and private helicopters, one of my neighbors is a fighter pilot, and he buzzes our neighborhood everytime hes in the area, so im familiar with jets, and like clockwork every night at 11:00pm the stealth fighter flies over!!!...Every night like clockwork. the stealth is very easy to identify, especially at night due to its unique light patterns, as well as a extremely bright landing light that actually illuminates the lake for miles below as it comes closer from the west, eastward tword kalamazoo air base. the stealth shape is very unique as well perfect triangle. 
   my friend tried telling me they were probably planes, so i called him over to my deck to have a look with some bonoculars. it didnt take him long to realize it was not a plane, it becomes aparent to him because there is a more than one plane in the area where the orbs appeared. so its pretty easy to tell its not planes, especially when there is like 5-12 planes circleing in the area.
   that was the other thing that has really made this stand out, once the orbs appear, planes start coming from every direction, straight out to the area of the orbs, and then these planes circle out in the lake for hours, up to three or fours to be exact, and its strange because one of the first nights i saw the orbs, within about 15-20 min. a stealth went over my head from the inland south eastern area "kalmazoo" ,directley out to the area of the orbs, the stealth circled for three hours and then came back in the same path it went out, and as it was coming back in, another jet "not stealth but indeed a jet"  came from the exact inland area and went out and circled, it became very obvious to me that there was something of inturest out there because at one point i counted over ten planes circleing the area for hours!!!!
  this is no joke and i am not lieing to you ppl, if anyone reads this and wants to see for themselves, hop in your car and drive to a park called "windsnest park", or "kirk park"..In between holland and grand haven  around 8-9pm anynight and look to the southwest area over the lake, be patient, but you will def see what im talking about. and these orbs are not boats, or flares. they keep reapearing allmost every clear night, and they are making insane manuvers that would kill a person. they are bouncing around, taking off at very high speeds and then without even stopping, all of a sudden shooting back in the other direction. these firballs are moving real fast to, much faster than the jets that are following them. is this top secrtet government testing? unmaned aircraft?
prototypes? what the hell is it? whatever it is, it is weird? bright fast and "jumping" around in the sky, allmost like if you were playing with a laser pointer. i guess jumping, bouncing, and playing are the only good way to describe how their movement. this is very inturesting, and i would love to find out some day whats going on out over my lake. i know that some of these pilots im seeing following the fireballs may have the answere, and honestly i am very supprised that none of them have put a report on mi. mufon, because i know they saw it too!!!!
   why cant are leaders tell all of us what they know about these strange lights all over our country, as well as the world. to me this seems very important for us a humans, as a species, and a society at whole to know? to know the truth? i am in no way saying i think what i am seeing is from another world, or something lake that. but what i am saying is whatever i am seeing, is moving around in the sky like no flying aircraft i have ever seen in my 25 years on like michigan. and in the way it moves seems like it would kill its ocupants "the amazing speeds to dead stops, and up and down manuvers" just seem like that would flatten me and you from the inside out. somethings not right here? and the first night i saw them, they were just hanging "floating" or hovering in a triangle pattern in the sky, a huge triangle pattern with one orb it the tip of the triangle and one on each bottom corner, the lights were perfect cicles and seemed orangeish and firery, but the very contained, no glare or light outside the orb. i guess sefl contained might be the right was to say it.
i also want to remind and stress how these orbs just vanished, like you dimed the light, just there one minute and gone the next.
also when they were in the triangle pattern they seemed to be in sync with eachother, also the triangle was massive, from where i was on the beach, i would say the triangle had to be over a mile from top to bottom.\just massive and almost seemed like they were connected somehow, because of the ever so slight movement, the triangle went straight up in the air. so when the triangle appeared you could say the botttom with the two orbs was closest to the surface of the water, and the top orb at the tip of the triangle was sraight up above it, im trying to explain it, its hard thought. basically the triangle orb formation was pointing vertically up at the sky, and moving slowly tword space, straight up and down, and the only time these orbs were moving that slow is when they were in the triangle formation. they only moved slow in formation, or when they were hovering, any other time they were bouncing around like bats out of hell. believe!!!!!! if its all you do just be open to something bigger than me or you! because something was out there, something very strange, and obvouisley very cool and powerful. for all we know it could be our ownn airforce. sorry so long
content.summary: Triangle fireball orbs, over lake mi, followed by stealth aircraft, bouncing around in the sky, making "w" like patterns, and going extremely fast, and coming to a complete stop.

content.detailedDescription:
In february of 1976 my self and two friends were on a multi-day backpacking journey in slickrock creek wilderness located in the nantahala national forest of western north carolina. we were prepared for several days of remote hiking and had chosen a period of time after the close of hunting season for our safety and also to be as isolated as possible with hopes of seeing no people. slickrock creek wilderness is a large road less tract intertwined with deep coves and rugged high southern peaks best known for great trout streams, good bear and wild boar hunting. the weather was absolutely stellar with crystal skies and temperatures at night in the teens. we made our way into a very secluded small cove known as nichols cove, a side drainage to the main valley of slickrock creek and there we established our first camp. at the end of a day of scrambling up creeks to locate undiscovered waterfalls and orienteering over trail less mountaintops we returned to our camp for some much needed rest and food. after our dinner and after the fire had been established we sat back to enjoy the brisk night air and to gaze into the milky way on one of those winter nights that the stars are countless and seem much closer to earth. we all noticed an unusual light somewhat larger than any of the stars moving erratically across the sky, stopping and going and making right angled turns. the light appeared disc shaped and the color was white like a star but less brilliant, somewhat duller and less jewel like than a star. from our camp in the small cove we could see the horizon and the mountaintops surrounding us quite clearly. the disc began to come closer and closer towards our location startling us a bit but we laughed it off and made some jokes about martians. as the light grew in size we could see that it was indeed a disc shaped object. there was no sound and it continued coming closer to earth dropping behind the ridgeline that separated us from the slickrock valley. as the disc went out of sight into the adjacent valley a glow spreading into the night sky moved north to south and back again as if following the exact route of the creek. after a few moments the glow began to move up our small valley becoming brighter and brighter as it came closer. all of a sudden a behemoth craft larger than a football field, equally the size of several jumbo jets lifted up slowly and hovered just above the tree line over a small ridge illuminating the entire area. we could see that the light from the disc we had seen in the sky was actually the underneath of the craft and it was encircled in multi-colored lights most of which were reddish in color. we were completely mesmerized and we could 'feel' that someone or something was in the craft and we felt certain they knew we were there. at the risk of sounding clich���, the only image of this thing that i can accurately relate to you to describe this is the end scene in "close encounters of the third kind" where the large ship comes to the top of the mountain. this monster was that large and that dynamic and we were practically catatonic at the sight of it. it was almost ironic months later when that movie came out and we tried in vain to explain to people that was what we saw. back to the story; in the blink of an eye and with absolutely no sound this huge craft shot skyward faster than the eye could follow and again became the white disc light that we had seen earlier. as if this was not enough to frighten us none of us had moved from our positions around our campfire. a couple of seconds later we began to hear a roaring noise and a pair of fighter jets roared into our black little valley coming so close to the ground we could see the undersides of them. this is when we al seemed to 'wake up'. we all screamed and jumped away into the night. the jets made a few more passes and then returned from the direction and whence they had come. 

wait, there is more...First, i am always the fire keeper and after this event was over we all assumed that it took about 20 minutes for the entire scenario to play out. as i said, it was a rather cold evening and i had built a large fire with several hard wood logs that i had cut. we all noticed that the fire was almost burned to coals. second, we had intended on a week or more of backpacking through the region but the very next morning we packed up without speaking a word and drove the 7 hour trip back to our hometown never mentioning what we had seen. third, we all worked together at a local restaurant at the time and not one of us spoke about the event until a few months later at a large outdoor party to celebrate the purchase of a friend���s new farm. dancing around the party fire that night the conversation turned ubiquitously to ufo`s and lights in the sky. standing next to my friend he began to curse at everyone telling them that they didn���t know what 'bleep' that were talking about. he grabbed me sobbing and exclaimed to everyone "he is the only one that knows". it was at this point that i myself began to remember that night in our camp in tiny little nichols cove. i will not purport to speculate regarding the origins of the craft we witnessed that night but as a fairly observant guy and somewhat of an aviation buff, i can tell you that we humans are not capable of producing the thing we saw flying even unto this day. unless the federal government is hiding some rather amazing technology i will maintain that we do not have crafts such as this. this story has lived with me for decades now and upon occasion will haunt my dreams but i am always amused when people want to tell me their ufo stories and talk about seeing lights in the sky. i listen quite carefully and empathetically to them and then i say "did you get the jets with yours?" that���s my story and i���m sticking to it.
content.summary: Very large ship with no noise, jets come to chase it, ship moves faster than thought.

content.detailedDescription: I was up quite late--around 2 am--and was in my 5th floor sw washington dc apt. bedroom looking out the window at the sky. it faced south towards the potomac. it was a clear evening and the stars were out. one in particular in the se caught my eye as it seemed to be moving. it was far away and smaller compared, and at first i thought it might be an airplane or jet. it moved parallel to the sky, then stopped for a moment. as i watched, it then zipped back the other way so fast at about 45 degrees that there was no way that it could have been any type of air vehicle i knew of. it moved entirely too fast! i then didn't see it anymore. i couldn't believe what i had seen and tried to wake my husband to tell him about it.
content.summary: Moved too fast to be a jet or airplane.

content.detailedDescription: I was out side looking toward the east when i saw the first one.It took about an hour and a half to ascend not parallel with the stars and it was larger than the stars,a good distance away,it almost seemed to be disguising itself as one,but it was more brilliant "definitely not a star"then i noticed two more that were not pulsating different colors,but i could definitely see them moving,it is possible the middle one was the space station,i don't think so but it may be possible,i know planes and one even passed under it!!I know my stars and planets very well.I could not stop staring at them to the point that my neck started locking up,then they became obscured by clouds.I suggest you monitor that region as i can only hope they return tonight in a clear sky.Points i missed:i was at a hotel in raleigh, nc visiting a friend who thinks i'm nuts,but i looked out the window and couldn't even break myself away to get a cigarette.I thought at first it was a ufo but my friend kept me a little skeptical but only for a few minutes then my mind was positive.The biggest one was pulsating blue,red,and other colors that blurred together but it was mainly blue,it was slowly ascending but making strange like "hops"?Laterally.  the smaller ones where making forward motions in different directions but none of the strange lateral "hops" and were moving much slower. as far as my feelings go, i was thrilled/beside myself with elation hoping someone else credible had witnessed this phenomena. to me it confirmed long held beliefs. i did not feel threatened in any way. unfortunately, i did not have a camera with me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multi-colored pulsating moving in "unnatural" motion, ascending slowly.

content.detailedDescription: When we were sitting at the docks in empire, i climbed out the window and sat on the door of her truck. we were conversing and we both saw this round object in the sky and it had lights on it. it kind of zig zigged and then like a shot was gone. we were both mesmerized and was quiet, after it was gone, we went home and told her husband about it since he used to work for the navy and he thought we were nuts. my sister  gave you a statement and i was afraid to tell you about it for fear of being called nuts, but i did see it and what she said was the truth. i hope this helps in anyway.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My sister [cms pid] and i saw a ufo over the ocean when we were sitiing at the docks in empire.

content.detailedDescription:
Occurred : 7/3/2008 11:00  location: raleigh, nc shape: cylinder duration:2 to 3 seconds

i was driving roughly westward on the raleigh inner beltline near the six forks rd exit when i saw directly in front of me what obviously was an airliner flying at low speed. it was at extremely low altitude and seemed about 2 or 3 miles away flying just barely above the trees and straight across my path. i stared at it for maybe 2 seconds. it was a long slim cylinder of shiny metal with two colored sections-one red and one black each about 1/3 of the length of the craft. i saw no wings, tail or engines but assumed this was due to looking from the side of the plane and maybe some subtle reflection of sunlight was hiding the tail. also, since it is extremely common to see aircraft approaching nearby raleigh/durham international airport, i instantly dismissed it as an airliner. so i looked slightly away from it to maintain my lane position but glanced right back within about 1 second to confirm what type of plane it was. within that one second it had vanished. i blinked my eyes repeatedly like you see people do in the movies... but due to the craft's low speed and relatively wide sighting area i had in front of me i would have had to look away for at least 5 or 6 seconds to miss it going behind trees and buildings. this event didn't conform to any rational explanation i can think of other than that it was an extremely advanced technology and either departed or became invisible instantaneously. 
i've read that many new pictures of ufo's are being reported by people who saw nothing while shooting normal pictures with a new digital camera but the objects turned up when they reviewed the images later. i wonder if the human eye can do something akin to this in the right circumstances-where a brief glance might catch the object you can't otherwise see.
content.summary: Cylinder-shiny metal- two colored sections-1 red, 1 black

content.detailedDescription: On vacation in santa fe, nm. my wife and i were on the balcony of our hotel taking pictures of each other.  i thought it would be funny to snap some pics of the night sky because i had been joking about area 51 with my wife.  i took 11 pics about 2 seconds apart and in about the same area.  when i looked at the back of the lcd display to review, i saw that some of the pics had white dots in them and showed my wife. she laughed and we forgot about them. i recently looked at them and zoomed in on these dots.  they look like donut shaped gases.  in one of them it looks like something is entering/exiting it. it's pretty strange.  i will include the original and the cropped pics.  you need to zoom in close to see the detail.

This was a long time ago and as hundreds of people saw it i was hoping to get more info on it. there was a travel advisory which i as a teenager ignored. i also took the backroads home from dropping off my girlfriend. i turned off highway 158 between belleville illinois and millstadt. i have never known the name of this road. it connects 158 with the newly called frank scott parkway. the sky was clear .Snow all over the ground. there was a full moon. i saw this huge object motionless in the sky. it looked triangular from my vantage point. i got out of my car and sat on the hood watching it. i focused on the lights since i had no camera. it was surrounded on its edge by flashing colored lights. they changed color very quickly. at the time i remembered the sequence but now i do not recall. 2 airforce jets came after it and as they approached the object went slowly up and out of sight. the jets did not follow object up in the sky they turned around and returned to scott air force base nearby. it was in the belleville news democrat as hundreds called in . the air force denied having any planes in the sky that night. who knows more???????

p.S i am not sure of the month. pretty sure it was 1977 but could have  been 1976 0r 1978.

i noticed it because there was so much snowfall that i could not see the road, i was hunched over my steering wheel up close to the windshield when i noticed the flashing lights. the full moon and snowfall made the sky quite bright. i immediately thought it was a ufo because it was so large, motionless and made no sound that i could hear. i really do not know how big it was. at the time i thought it was the size of a football field. i was still for 6-8 minutes until the airforce arrived.
content.summary: Huge triangular ufo over belleville, illinois 1977.

content.detailedDescription:
This may sound strange coming in so late after all this happened. but i decided i might as well get it out there now before i forget most of the details. i had a similar experience to this, but not the same day, it was actually just one day later on january 9th, a wednesday. everything i say is 100% truth, i have no reason to lie about this.

anyways, this all occurred somewhere between the hours of 10pm and 12am. i'm not exactly sure on the time, but i was coming home from church. the reason it was so late is because some of us had hung out for a while that night. i think it was more around 10 though the location was right outside of tye, tx, a small town just a few miles outside of abilene, which is about a 3 hour drive west of dfw. i was driving on 707(a road that goes straight through tye and eventually hits abilene) just making my way back from church, i made a stop at the flying-j on 707 to get a drink and snack to play games for a few hours with, and as i was leaving i saw a bright white light in the sky in the direction straight ahead of where i was. it looked almost like a flashlight would if it were 15 feet in front of you, best way to describe it. it was probably about a mile or two away from where i was when i first saw it. keep in mind this road is straight for several miles after it goes through tye. so i continued driving towards it because that is where i needed to go. the closer i got to it it seemed as if it was just in a fixed spot and wasn't moving at all. i took a video of me driving towards it, which i will talk about in a second, and i actually pulled up next to it. i stopped parallel to this "thing" and watched it for several minutes. it hovered there making no sound whatsoever. i even shut off the car to see if i could hear anything and couldn't. this object was floating, or hovering, only about 200 feet off the ground if that and was only about 100 feet away from me. it was stopped slightly over a house and just sat there for about 2-3 minutes. it had several lights on the bottom that would flash blue, red, and green, but not like any aircraft i have ever seen before. it made a strange pattern. it started out coming from the bright light at the front and continued down the bottom straight but towards the end it broke out into two different lines making a triangular shape. the craft didn't really have a defined shape to it, all i could see was a very faint silhouette and it almost appeared as if you could see through it. like i said before, it hovered there for just a few minutes, making no sound at all, and when i stepped out of my car to get a better look it took off. at first, it was slow, but then it went pretty fast. i continued to watch it fly straight ahead until i could no longer see it. it did make a small, but not like what i have heard from airplanes, sound when it took off at first. after the initial sound, it didn't continue to make any noise. for some reason though, i had my phone sitting in my lap the whole time and didn't take anymore video footage, i guess i was just too dumbfounded to do anything. it was by far the scariest, weirdest, and mind-boggling thing that i have ever witnessed.
immediately following this event, and called my mom telling her that i think i just saw a ufo and she just laughed and told me to come home. i got home, showed her the video and she was just skeptical about the whole thing. also, one detail that i clearly remember is that absolutely no one else was driving down the road while i was on it. it was rather odd because there is usually someone on it no matter what time of day it is. anyways, about the video, i kept it until my phone broke about 2 months later and lost the video for good, so i have no more physical evidence of this.
that following monday morning i was woke up early and told to come watch the news, it was about the stephenville sighting the day before i had my sighting. all i had to say to my mom was i told you i saw something. she finally believed me after that and wanted me to report it to abc, but i didn't want to because i just didn't want to be out there on tv(if it got that far) or anything of the sort, so i kept it between me, her, and a few friends. i only told a few people that i knew which included 2 teachers and some friends and classmates of mine during a small class, and they all believed every word i said and even i was surprised by it. they all told me that they all had no reason not to trust me.
now for those of you who look up the locations, yes, there dyess air force base is just a few miles from that location where this occurred. i know what i saw, and it was no aircraft i have ever seen before. i may not know a lot about aircraft but i know that dyess did not have one of these, or at least open to the public. i have lived near that airbase for a total of about 7 years so i know what the aircraft they do have looks like. i have seen several airplanes that they have that have a bright light on the front of the plane, but nothing compared to what i saw.
now i'm not claiming this was a government experiment or an alien craft or anything, i just know what i saw was a ufo and i still can't explain what i saw.

for those of you who would like some information about me, my name is bryce lachance and i am currently 18 but was 17 when this happened.
content.summary: Something i saw a day after the stephenville incident, but didn't hear about till about 5 days later.

content.detailedDescription:
We lived from 1979 till 1996 on hannibal st. mesa, arizona. at approximately 9:00 pm in march 1985 i was walking my dog mindy east on hannibal st. mesa, arizona towards the superstition mountains.  back then there were very few homes or lights from power road to the superstitions.  it was very dark and i looked up into the sky and saw a v shaped object with 5 lights on it.  one in the front and 2 or possibly 3 on each side.  

i worked at mcdonnel douglas helicopter company at the time and i thought at first glance it was 5 of our helicopters just hovering in the sky. they had bright lights like big planes lights, but they did not move. i watched for about 20 minutes and i realized our helicopters could not do that for that long. i asked some of our engineers the next day about that. 

i thought to myself, oh good a ufo.  then thought i wonder what they are like.  at that the object started to move towards us.  my dog looked up and started barking.  with them moving towards us, i started to walk faster back towards my house. (i guessed they could read minds because when i thought this was not a good thing and i kept looking back, they seemed to stop, then they just shot off what looked like in different directions.  it happened in a nano second and then they were gone.  i came home and told my husband.  i listened to the news and checked the newspaper the next day, but never heard a thing about this sighting.  i wanted to report this, but i didn't know who to call..  i tried reporting many years later to mufon, but i guess it didn't go through.  i was not that good on the computer at the time and had no idea how to send things.  i'm sure i messed up the report.

since then i have seen them 2 more times and my hubby 1 time at our home in queen creek.  if you want those dates i will fill in a report. sorry no photos, i had no camera with me at the time.  seems like it is always in cooler weather they appear like in march for me. i know the people who saw the phoenix lights are right, they do exist.    wendy
content.summary: Exactly like the phoenix lights  a v shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was staying in a cabin with a friend for the night 2 kilometeres out of st mary's in tasmania, australia. i was out on the balcony having a cigarette and a cup of coffee (the property has amazing views and is high up in terms of sea level etc)and i was pointing out to my friend from china where the "saucepan" constellation (southern hemisphere) is in the night sky.

about 2 minutes after he went back inside i was amazed to see a circular shaped object with the colours blue, red and green pulsating and rotating quite fast in the middle of the object.

it was (from my view) moving slowly along the bottom of the "saucepan" constellation in a straight line. it then shot up at a 90 degree angle and stopped just as quickly.

it then started a 'saw-tooth' type of flight for maybe 8 seconds then it moved at astonishing speed into the clouds where it dissapeared for good. i stood there for quite awhile looking up, partly in amazement and confusion, as to just what it was that i had just witnessed.

in the morning i asked the owner of the rental cabins had he or his partner ever seen strange lights in the sky (they have both lived there for 9 years). he replied they both had seen objects moving at incredible speed but with only 2 different colours as opposed to my 3.

they have a powerful telescope which is able to take pictures of the night sky but the conversation ended there.

i don't know what it was that i saw and whether it was natural, man made or something else. but to me it just felt that it was under intelligent control. the way that it paused then moved in a controlled fashion and also the mind boggling speeds it was reaching makes me believe that it was not nature at work.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red, green & blue lights rotating quite fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Enclosed herein is a recording of a ufo for your observation and analysis to supprement the ufo sighting and subsequent alien abduction story i sent mr. james carrion on november 13, 2008.

on june 11, 2008, at approximately 2:52am, i was alone in the living room when i suddenly got a feeling that i should go outside onto the balcony and there it was again. my camcorder was not in the immediate area, but luckily i had my cellphone with me.  it appeared to be a saucer shape craft, similar to the one i've seen previously, with lights around it. it was hovering motionless. please listen to the sound it made mixed the crickets chirping in the background. the sound is similar to the strange humming sound i've heard before. it was over the wooded mountains near the other house i had to move to in aguada, puerto rico. the reason why i send it to you now was because it was recorded with my cellphone. we didn't know how to transfer the recording into my computer or burn it on a dvd disk. a friend finally transferred the information on a disk and then into my computer. i recorded the object for approximately 15 seconds before i feared to be alone in balcony and in the dark. thank you for your attention.
content.summary: I recorded on my cellphone what appeared to be a saucer shape ufo in the very dark wooded area at night, about 2:52am while in the balcony in aguada, pr.

content.detailedDescription:
From ���on this day - encounters with aliens on this day���  
compiled by dr. donald a. johnson
http://www.Ufoinfo.Com/onthisday/

{my additions} ��� i did not witness this event.

 ���three gray disc performed aerobatics over the city of campinas, sao paulo state, brazil {70 kilometers nw of sao paulo} on this afternoon in 1954 {december 14}. one of the ufos peeled off, dove low over the roof of a local woman's house, and dropped a liquid substance "like silver rain." chemical analysis revealed that the solidified material was 90% tin with other alloys. (source: jacques vallee, confrontations: a scientist's search for alien contact, p. 49).��� 

tin ��� from wikipedia

���isotopes
tin is the element with the greatest number of stable isotopes (ten), which is probably related to the fact that 50 is a "magic number" of protons. 28 additional unstable isotopes are known, including the "doubly magic" tin-100 (100sn).

���applications
tin becomes a superconductor below 3.72 k {-452.974 f}. in fact, tin was one of the first superconductors to be studied; the meissner effect, one of the characteristic features of superconductors, was first discovered in superconducting tin crystals {see superdiamagnetism}. the niobium-tin compound nb3sn is commercially used as wires for superconducting magnets, due to the material's high critical temperature (18 k, {-427.27 f}) and critical magnetic field (25 t). a superconducting magnet weighing only a couple of kilograms {about 4.5 pounds} is capable of producing magnetic fields comparable to a conventional electromagnet weighing tons.

{1991} ���. . . the burning oil-wells in kuwait, where firefighters used "corrugated tin heat shields".  . . . seem to reflect heat the best . . ..

���it is estimated that, at current consumption rates and technologies, the earth will run out of tin that can be mined in 40 years. however lester brown has suggested tin could run out within 20 years based on an extremely conservative extrapolation of 2% growth per year.

���the recovery of tin through secondary production, or recycling of scrap tin, is increasing rapidly. while the united states has neither mined since 1993 nor smelted tin since 1989, it was the largest secondary producer, recycling nearly 14,000 tons in 2006.

���in 2007, the people's republic of china was the largest producer of tin . . . with 43% of the world's share, followed by indonesia, with an almost equal share, and peru at a distant third, reports the usgs.

���after the discovery of tin in what is now bisie, north kivu in the democratic republic of congo in 2002, illegal production has increased there to around 15,000 tons. this is largely fueling the ongoing and recent conflicts there, as well as affecting international markets.���
content.summary: Disc drops liquid in 1954 that turns out to be tin.

content.detailedDescription: I was riding the bus and looking out my window and saw a disk it had blue lights and a yellow one in the middle do you know what it is? i was shocked at the scene, and could not move.
content.summary: Riding the bus the whole bus saw it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on i-40 between tucumcari and albquerque on my vegas. as i was admiring the dust sky, i noticed a long narrow storm cloud about 50 miles in front of me. at the bottom of the cloud i saw 2 lights resembling the head lights of an airplaine. just then, the two lights moved horizontally towards each other forming 1 large light about the size of a silver dollar. the 2 lights reappeared moving a few inches to the south just as 2 more lights moved a few inches to the north leaving the large light in the middle. they remained still for a moment before the 2 lights on the left shot off south and the 2 lights on the right shot off north faster than my eyes could follow. shortly after the large central light shot strait up through the cloud above and dissapearred just as fast. the strangiest thing is the large central light left a perfect hole in the storm cloud. i didn't noticed i had slowed down during this time but as i looked around the highway it seemed every car and truck was moving just as slow and straining to see out their windows as well. after driving about 30 minutes i was now closer to albquerque and closer the the storm cloud. i could see the cloud had become more narrow and the hole remained as if there was no condisation in that area of the cloud.

i can not explain how large this object was if it seemed to be the size of a silver dollar at 50 miles away or why when moving through the cloud, there was no disturbance in the cloud, and what would vaporize the air in such a dark storm cloud to leave a perfect hole.
content.summary: 2 small lights come together into 1 very large light then separated into 4 small lights on both sides of the large light.
content.locationName: Btw Tucumcari and Albuque, New Mexico

content.detailedDescription: Got alian in plant in my bodey it hurts when it moves around please help me  have photos of live alians and spaceships
content.summary: Followed me 30 mins.

content.detailedDescription:
The event began at the end of the dirt road that i lived off of. my driveway was circular and we backed up to the woods, where we usually go for walks. it was early evening from what i remember. me and my boyfriend , at the time, were walking down the block coming from the pool in the country club. my dog was with us and as we approached the beginning of my driveway we noticed a light glowing in the woods. the dog began barking and we didn't hear any noise. we thought it was someone walking their dog in the woods, however, we didn't hear any leaves cracking as if someone was walking around. we started to call out and i even said "et go home, i don't have any reeces pieces", lol. the dog ran into the woods barking like crazy and came running out with his tail between his legs, he looked very scared. still we didn't hear any noise and we started to get scared so we walked down the end of the driveway towards the house. it looked like a flashlight glowing down. as i stood by the front door something made me look up as the second i looked up i saw a million little lights at the same time the object took off, quietly, no noise and went up towards my neighbors house. i thought i was imagining it and i ran inside as my mother was cleaning the dishes. i told her what i saw and she thought i was crazy and tyold me to go to bed. i knew i saw something, i even felt a burst of energy as i looked up. the next morning our neighbor, who was my mom's friend, called and told my mother she wasn't going to believe what she saw the night before. she went on to say she was sitting on her back porch crocheting and she looked up and saw a huge flying object just hovering over her house. she said it didn't make any noise but had a lot of small lights, i guess it was circular from what i remember. this proved to my mom that i wasn't imaging it!!! i will never forget this experience. 

please let me know if others saw the same thing i did.
content.summary: It was hovering over my house, 89a pomona rd. suffern ,n.Y. 10901

content.detailedDescription: As i do every morning, i was driving on route 88 north in westport, massachusetts at 4:05 am - on my way to work, when a softball sized glowing orb which was orange/yellow in color flew out of the woods on the other side of the road.  it flew in front of my car (less than 50 yards in front of me).  it proceeded across the road into the woods on my side of the road.  i had no idea what the object was, as i have never seen anything like it.  it appeared to be solid, yet translucent.  it was moving so quickly that i couldn't follow it's progress after it entered the woods.
content.summary: Orange/yellow translucent softball sized orb flew across road.

content.detailedDescription: I was out smokin a cigerette on the stairs in my back yard, and i walk down do somethin then when i was done, i started to waslk back up and right when i started to sit down i seen somethin in the corner of my eye, when i looked up and saw it for a split second it took off really fast, it was silent dont rmemeber the shape of it couse it was so fast but it was within 300 feet from me just hovering in the air not making one noise. after words i was thinking it could of been the governement but then i thought no why would the governemnet want to do that, then again why would extraterrestrials want to i dont know, maybe because ive always wanted to see one and they new it, ive had dreams with them in it, and they just wanted to show me their infact real, couse i belived in them but then i had doubts couse i never seen one before. and ever since then i seen like 4 other ones, but they were much far away it was dark out and they all appeared out of nowhere and dissapeard again(their bright lights lit up the craft) then it would disapear again like going threw dimensions or somethin.
content.summary: In my backyard.

content.detailedDescription: Live in diamond valley and i was on my way home and i was about 50-75 feet from my house, driving, and i saw five lights and i thought kinda strange for a b-52 bomber to be flyin that low right at me directly above the center of the road. i figured it was one bec it was so low and it had a brighter light in the center and two on either side that where parallel with each other but not the center light. so as im going down the 50 feet (which is a small hill that goes down levels out and then goes back up to a greater hill my house is on the bottom slope of the hill about 15ft up from the flat point, but this road is completely straight, it just goes up and down (i know this is the straightest point bec i useto ride my bike there and only there bec it was the only point where you could see cars coming from either directions, almost like a half pipe, but one side three times smaller than the other and ive lived in this house since i was 8 and im now 20 and i've lived in the neighbourhood since i was 5.) anyways these five lights are very slowly coming towards me, and as im headed down the little hill i notice it move directly left and i kinda thought to myself did that just do that?? or am i trippin? bec had it been a b-52 it would of had to bend sideways to move that way and straighten out and this would of had to of been done in prob 2 sec max. so i dismissed it and i keep lookin at it and im now at the flat part and it moves the same distance but to the right directly right and then i was like, ok wtf is that. and as im thinkin this it moves back to the direct center again (at that time i was going slightly up the hill to my driveway) i park cockeyed in my driveway about 3/4 in the rest of my car in the road and i see it and i realize its black and its just starting to go under me and im thinkin woah that looks like a stealth bomber and now is where it gets really strange, after that point this thing dropped in altitude and slowed down and i realize it was either much bigger or much smaller than initally presumed. its a completely jet black pyramid rotating very very slightly, so black that the just setted sun behind it would of created a reflection but it had none, as it passed beneith me i saw four lights, it was a flat triangluar area at each of the three points a different colored light was strobing very slowly but never went out just got brighter and less bright in sequince with the other two on the courners the corners closest to me where blue and green and the other corner light was red and in the middle was a sufficently brighter whitish yellow light, as its going over me im screaming at it yelling you! hey yo0u! come down! wtf are you! come down now! and right as it passed the point under me. absolutly no sound, i could see and hear other planes that where very far away compaired to this thing (it went from my left to right, bec my house is on the left side of the road) and was followin the road it turned off the blue and green and red lights just the whitish yellow ones where there and i looked exactly like a plane and started strobing the red light like a plane would, white lights (and red,blue,green before turned off) ---....Oooo00000oooo.... red light after moved over me ---..O0.0.0o.. just like a plane two red flashes every four sec. at this time i flipped my [cms pd] and sprinted to the side door of my house (my car was still on in the driveway) i slipped on some ice and busted my thumb but at the time i was too excited to feel it i ran to the deck which kinda faces the direction it was headed, the direction i came from. grabbed binocks and watched it continue over hwy69 i could not focus on those lights it was if they where unreal, most airplanes flying that low with lights on in that visablitly i would of been able to see the bulb of the light while it was strobing and when it wasnt but i couldnt and there was no reflection of the pure jet blackness of the object; i gave the binocks to my mother who had heard the commotion and she looked at it and said it was a pyramid rotating slightly and flying on its side, on an angle and my mother is a student services cashier at embry riddle aranotical school of enginering, all she does when she is at that position is do student loans, but they make her go out to the airport and do flightline where she is there and watches every plane from erau take off and land and log their hours and she said those where not the lights of a plane and that was not how any of our planes fly. this was dec 14 2008 at six p.M. (just about on the dot, maybe five, ten min give or take) mountain time
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A black pyramid rotating slightly on bottom redlight, bluelight and green.

content.detailedDescription: I went out side to take my dog out for the night potty break  about 10:00p.M on the 10th and look up like i usely do and saw so may bright lights going east to west i call my husband to come out side to see them also they were so pretty  they were very bright lights i took some pictures with my cell phone  in 20 min we say about fifty of them the clouds were coming in and they were under the clouds you could see them slowly moving they were not fast moving but very slow i call my daugther in il. but she didn't see them there , so i call my other daugther that lived about 10 mi from me and she could see them as well . i wish i could let everyone see them but i dont have text on my cell phone so i can't send them to the computer
content.summary: They where very bright and some was side by side there were about fifty in 20 min.

content.detailedDescription:
I, along with four friends, were at the palatka (florida) golf club having dinner, when we saw two star-like objects near the full moon. the five of us witnessed this event. we all took pictures and videos with our cell phone cameras. the objects darted about the sky for about an hour. the objects made movements unlike airplanes or helicopters or balloons or flares. there was no noise. none of us had ever seen anything like this before. the same two objects were also seen, at the same time, by my family members living 20 miles to the west. after about an hour the objects vanished instantly.

i don't know how to get my video of these objects in the file box below. contact me and i can email it to you at mufon.
the video i have is amazing. i have not seen the other videos and photos taken by my friends.
content.summary: Two star-like objects appeared near full moon in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
This isn't the first time i have seen ships from another world...I was riding my bike home from my storage witch was a good five miles. it was just after dusk and i was tired from the ride. i open the gate to bring in my bike and as i looked up between the two tall trees at the other end of my parents yard i saw an orange flickering light. now after my ride my eyes were a little watery so i kept my focus on the light and was thinking that it may be a small airline jet. after a minute or two went bye i regained my vision and notice the craft descending towards our house. at first it was about a good two miles away at an altitude of about 1500 feet and traveling about 140 to 220 mph. i knew this wasn't right because our house sits directly under the landing flight path for san francisco, san jose, and oakland airports. this was coming opposite from the normal paths that the jumbo jets take. also stanford hospital is very close by which uses medivac helicopters and it wasn't that either. my history on the knowledge of aircrafts is great because i used to wash and wax jets and helicopters at santa barbara airport(that's another story!). 
  so as i walked through the yard staring at the craft it came closer and was reducing it speed to about 50 mph. now the craft is hovering almost directly above our property. just to my left my parents(non-believers)were watching tv in the family room and asking what was i doing. i told my dad to get off his ass and tell me what i am looking at.He was in the army and the used to work for ibm and once in awhile due business at moffett field afbase. so he came out then my mother and they couldn't explain it. i told him to go get the binoculars and he did so. now the craft was as close as it was going to get which was about 700-800 feet above going about 20-30mph if that. i could describe it as a sound sphere like object that the upper half hald an orange glow that would brighten then dimm. then when my dad came back it started to darken yet brighten up again, but this time it's lights were displaying like something you see in vegas where the lights start at one point then fan out taking shape of an umbrella and would repeat this for about 5 minutues. now about 15 miutes have gone bye and after my father looked through the binoculars, i grab them to take a look see. when i looked it was at a stand still for a couple minutes and then from the bottom side facing away from me it started shooting out red beams of light,4 total but 2 at a time, one set above the other. the night sky was clear and a jumbo jet airliner was flying by in the distance on it's normal descent path. then it started to fade into the dark sky, never making a sound,yet i could still see it's silhouette for about another minute then that was it. the direction it came from was the pacific ocean and the santa cruz mountains,then curved towards our home between stanford hospital and interstate 280( where stanford linear accelerator,sandhill rd. turn off.)above menlo park(sharon heights),then went in the direction towards the bay north east. 
 the whole time i felt that this was cool that my parents saw this so now they cane believe my other stories. but when it shot those red lazer looking lights i got a little nervous.
content.summary: Orange craft slowly  flew over with no sound and was pulsating, then dimmed and shot red plasma beams of light.

content.detailedDescription: i walked outside to smoke a cigerette when i look up and noticed a very bright star in the sky. then the object dimmed itself to where i thought it disapeared only to watch it dart across the sky rapidly and reappear very bright. i ran inside and got my girlfriend and her digital camera. the object wasn't a star because there was heavy cloud cover and it blotted out the other stars when the clouds passed but not this thing. two planes flew underneath it as well. anyway as we watched perplexed it went through a series of dimming itself and then glowing very brightly. it floated from left to right across the sky and then raised and lowered it's altitude. i snapped six photographs of it and when i blew them up i was shocked. each shot seems to show a different shape. one has an orange and red orb in it, one has a white cylinder and the others have a white rod with a red glow on the end. i really don't know what this was but it really has us puzzled. as we watched in amazement after about fifteen minutes it just dimmed itself out and vanished. i tried to take other pictures on this same night of several bright stars in the sky but the camera wouldn't capture them but it got this thing. anybody have any idea what this thing is?
content.summary: Starlike object gives dazzling light show for me and my girlfriend.

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i had just turned south bound off of 400 s to johnson road toward laporte when coming from michigan city. upon making the turn, my wife, two sons and i all noticed an extremely bright series of 3 lights that was west of johnson road moving east.

     when we all locked our gaze on it, my wife commented (she is not a believer in ufos), "there is one of your ufos". i responed, "i don't think so that is either a plane landing at the michigan city airport or a tower light (from the nearby summit farm)". but it was still a courious enough event to keep us all watching to see if this was the case.

    as i watched the lights, they were all bright white (extremely bright and big). there was a series of three, and although i can not say definatively the craft could have been triangular as the two outer lights seemed somewhat smaller than the center, indicating that that light was closer than the other two. 
    i had originally assumed because of the size and brightness the lights were close to the ground, but i quickly realized that this craft was way upthere but gigantic! there were two planes in the same air space to judge by.
    as it moved from west to east, it suddenly switched directions and headed south and up. it disappeared before our eyes. we never saw it again. i assumed that maybe it had gone into some clouds, but as we continued driving toward where the object was there were no clouds, at all.
    my son who is 12 was in the back seat simply said, "i think ufos are real!"

    in addition, i have never seen a plane landing at the michigan city airport cross over johnson road, and even if that was a possibility the quick south bound turn and speedy disappearence remove that as a possiblity. it was not the tower that i suspected, because there is no way that i could have seen that tower from our position. it is not elevated enough and we were over 5 miles away and if it was it would have been west of position.
    i have no explaination for what we saw, but i had told a friend about it and he inturn told another mutual friend, who's son and his friends had seen a similar object in laporte about 3 hours before we saw this. he and his friends also said they thought the object was triangular, and they were more below the object. they also said the object was massive and although it looked low flying it was not.
content.summary: Extremely big and bright lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the summer of 2001 when my neighbor's youngest son knocked on our door. "there is something in the sky��� he said, come and see. i went to look along with my wife and son. we found our neighbor, his wife and two boys looking up at the 9pm night sky. all of us witnessed the same event. high in the sky was a glowing light, similar to a florescent tube. no sound was made. the sky was fairly clear with some passing clouds. this was no star or planet or meteor or comet or even a weather balloon! i would know the difference. it appeared to be far enough as to be in space, either at the edge or just above our atmosphere. i imagine it was of great size to be visible from that height. we watched as the tube seemed to shrink and almost fade out but then it grew back. sometimes it would appear to be rotating on its axis, spinning end over end. one thing i noticed as we watched it perform its maneuvers was that it remained in the exact same place in the sky for over an hour. that told me that it was geo-synchronous and moving exactly with the earth. had to have some kind of intelligence behind it. it did not fly away in any direction. after a while, i went for my telescope and set it up to view the object. the light seemed to have a greenish glow when viewed from the ground but through my telescope, i could see a definite cylindrical shape that glowed white. it also looked to me to be translucent, not really solid. it would almost shrink and fade out of existence then would suddenly be there again.

i remember thinking; this must be a government experiment in space. i didn't think it was a ufo at that time. i had recently viewed a lecture (on one of those college tv channels) on lasers and particle beam technology. this object seemed to behave exactly the same way as a particle beam would when being manipulated by an opposing laser vibrating at the same frequency as the beam. the beam would grow and then retreat according to the pressure applied by the opposing laser. i figured the government had something big going on up there. 

but then i read more about other sightings and how similar some of them were to ours. other people reported seeing an object that would seem to fade in and out of existence. also, many were initially viewed as cylindrical that would change phase. i thought that was pretty accurate. i also began to realize that the space station and shuttle all travel in an orbit and do not stay in one place for over an hour. my neighbors were convinced that what they were witnessing was an actual ufo. it took me a few years before i would believe it also. my neighbor said he phoned the local news channel but was told it was probably a "weather balloon". the next week an unusual amount of press came out about meteors and such. i figured this was just some attempt at disinformation for the public sake. 

to this day i have no idea what we all saw that night or how many others viewed it also. i have seen many happenings in the sky over the years. i have seen satellites fly by on their very high and very straight course. i know the difference between stars and planets and meteors and such. this was not any of those. not swamp gas either. this was a very large object at high altitude under intelligent control, doing some weird things. not natural at all. not the aurora borealis. it was very localized in the sky. 

i went back in the house and came out several times that evening to look again at the sky. i don't remember at what point it vanished for good. it did not return.
content.summary: Luminescent tube of greenish to white light changing shape and size high in the sky, sometimes rotating, fixed position for over an hour.

content.detailedDescription: Around 1am i was called to the window to witness what was atlest 100 star like crafts dropping into the kill van kull. no surprise someone from california just put up a report of exactly what i saw. me and my girlfriend were up till 4:30 am watching these low dropping objects. this is not the 1st time i have seen crafts above the kill van kull. out of all the crafts, the most memorable was a firey disc that shot across the sky in a strange wobbling motion. some crafts were also not lit up, but you seen them with the moon light reflection, dancing and playing with each other like kids. very peaceful display in their aerial acrobatics. since i was i child i seen crafts of all kinds. last night was somthing surreal.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Circle,  Disc,  Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Sphere,  Star-like
content.summary: At least 100 star crafts dropping into kill van kull.
